=== About Me ===
I'm a Technology student at the College Of Technology - Vietnam National University. I started using GNU/Linux with Ubuntu 7.04.

I'm working in translator team and contribute to Vietnamese Ubuntu users at www.ubuntu-vn.org.
=== Contribution ===
==== Translate Ubuntu into Vietnamese ====
Now i am active in Ubuntu translator team and some application such as Ubuntu Tweak, Transmission, Gnome-Do,... I am also using Ubuntu in Vietnamese language to review our translation.
==== Ubuntu-VN.org ====
I am administration of http://www.ubuntu-vn.org. I most active in our <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-vn.org|forum]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-vn.org|wiki]]</nowiki>.
=== Plan ===
* Continue translate Ubuntu and applications into Vietnamese.
* Maintain our forum and irc
* Build out wiki more completly
* Becoming an Approved Team
